channel.title: Emps-Scape: Online since 2006!
channel.description:
[center][url=http://emps-scape.net][img]http://emps-scape.net/images/emps.png[/img][/url] [size=16pt]Emps-Scape: No RSPS has more details![/size]
[size=12pt]Play now at www.emps-scape.net[/size]
[url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Emps-Scape/138306239555178][img width=50 height=50]http://www.emps-scape.net/images/facebook.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://emps-scape.net/wiki/][img width=50 height=50]http://emps-scape.net/wplogo.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.youtube.com/user/EmpsScapeChannel][img width=50 height=50]http://www.emps-scape.net/images/youtube.jpg[/img][/url] [/center]
[size=16pt]Features:[/size]
[ul][li]One of the world's oldest and most popular private servers - over 600+ players online at peak times. We have been around for 6 years![/li] [li]Extremely stable - no lag[/li] [li]1.000 players were online without any troubles[/li] [li]Multiple worlds supporting cross world private messaging and clan chat[/li] [li]Hosted on a DDoS protected server - online 24/7[/li] [li]Global stair and door handlers. Ever seen a RSPS where you can use every single door and stair in our available areas?[/li] [li]Perfected clipping systems. We offer realistic safe spots and no monster will every walk through a tree![/li] [li]A large and friendly player community[/li] [li]Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations[/li] [li]Stable economy[/li] [li]Challenging experience rate - not too fast or too slow[/li] [li]Battle in the wilderness with hundreds of players[/li] [li]Explore our world which spans several RuneScape towns and dungeons[/li] [li]Challenge many bosses and obtain rewards - GWD as the ultimate challenge[/li] [li]Several minigames, including duel arena, barrows, clan wars, castle wars, fight pits, fight caves and pest control![/li] [li]Full music and sound system in the client[/li] [li]Fullscreen and fixed screen client, resizable while playing[/li] [li]Working highscores on our website[/li] [li]All 377 skills are fully working[/li] [li]and even more!!...[/li][/ul]
[size=16pt]Media[/size] [img width=717 height=371]http://emps-scape.net/screenshots/showoff/falador.jpeg[/img]
[img width=717 height=371]http://emps-scape.net/screenshots/showoff/gwd.jpeg[/img]

[img width=717 height=371]http://emps-scape.net/screenshots/showoff/barbarian.jpeg[/img]
[img width=717 height=371]http://emps-scape.net/screenshots/showoff/barbarian2.jpeg[/img]

[size=16pt]Want to see more?[/size]
Visit us at [url=http://www.emps-scape.net]www.emps-scape.net[/url]
[size=16pt]Comments, questions, or constructive criticism?[/size]
Feel free to post them in this thread and we'll do our best to help you out!

item.title: Emps-Scape: Online since 2006!
item.dc:creator: @Thomy Thomy
item.description:
@Thomy wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:36, topic:463335”][quote author=Thomy link=topic=566747.msg4160008#msg4160008 date=1353008110]

Thanks for the positive comments guys.

@Ruby:
Nope… getting no response from Mopar and Taharok said that I need to wait for him… so yeah, looks like they don’t care.
Starting a google ads campaign now. Also going to give double XP for facebook likes. Should get us advertised a bit.

I could ask mitb next time he’s on the IRC if you want, he usually checks his PMs when he comes online but we’ve been running into a few problems with AdSense lately.

That’d be really really kind of you!
Problems with AdSense? How so? (Testing it too atm… that’s why I’m curiuos)
[/quote]

They discovered an “adult” related conversation on mitb.com. Moparisthebest’s wife has an account called srt8, which is a model of truck or something and someone posted a video of one being hit by another car and named it “srt8 taking it in the rear” or something along those lines. It was ridiculous that they could threaten to close our service when their ads themselves advertise “adult” themed websites.[/quote]

That’s indeed ridiculous… you’ll always find people posting inappropriate things on forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Emps-Scape: Online since 2006!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Thomy, post:32, topic:463335”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=566747.msg4159995#msg4159995 date=1353007034]

Thanks for the positive comments guys.

@Ruby:
Nope… getting no response from Mopar and Taharok said that I need to wait for him… so yeah, looks like they don’t care.
Starting a google ads campaign now. Also going to give double XP for facebook likes. Should get us advertised a bit.

I could ask mitb next time he’s on the IRC if you want, he usually checks his PMs when he comes online but we’ve been running into a few problems with AdSense lately.
[/quote]

That’d be really really kind of you!
Problems with AdSense? How so? (Testing it too atm… that’s why I’m curiuos)[/quote]

They discovered an “adult” related conversation on mitb.com. Moparisthebest’s wife has an account called srt8, which is a model of truck or something and someone posted a video of one being hit by another car and named it “srt8 taking it in the rear” or something along those lines. It was ridiculous that they could threaten to close our service when their ads themselves advertise “adult” themed websites.

Read full topic

The lowest spot on our sponsored list went for $25 this month and the highest was for $550, it’s worth a shot IMO.
